summary: This bill, the Iranian Campaign Medal Act, proposes the creation of a military service medal for members of the Armed Forces who served in support of operations related to the Iran-Israel War, including Operation Midnight Hammer. The Secretary of Defense will determine the medal's design, eligibility criteria (including active duty, specific areas of operations, or other designated service), and regulations for issuance. The medal can also be awarded posthumously to next-of-kin.  It limits the recipient to one medal.
